markdownRemark.html:
Forget not that modesty is for a shield against the eye of the unclean.

And when the unclean shall be no more, what were a modesty but a fetter and a fouling of the mind.

â€” Khalil Gibran, The Prophet.

frontmatter.title: Forget not that modesty is for a shield against the eye of the unclean.
